sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const AddPerson = (props) => { const schulungsleitIDs = props.schulungsleitIDs; const managerIDs = props.managerIDs; const gruppenIDs = props.gruppenIDs; function renderSwitch(param) { switch(param) { case 'manager': return ( <>
Gehalt:

Beschreibung:

); case 'lehrer': return ( <>
Skype-login:

Arbeitswochen:

Schulungsleit.-ID:

Manager-ID:

); case 'schueler': return ( <>
Niveau:

Gruppen-ID:

Manager-ID:

Payment date:

Payment sum:

); default: return; } } return (
{/*
*/}
Add person:
Role:

Manager
Lehrer
Schüler
Name:

Surname:

E-mail:

Phone:

{renderSwitch(props.personData.role)}
{(() => { if (props.userAdded === 1) { return ✓ User added } else if (props.userAdded === -1) { return ✗ An error occurred!; } else { return null; }})()}
)}; export default AddPerson;
